text: agar kisi aurath ko apne shuhar ki baadh-dimaaghi aur be-parvaahi ka khauf ho to duno aapas mein jo sulah karle us mein kisi par koyi gunaah nahi, sulah bahuth behtar cheez hai,tama21 har ek nafs mein shaamil kardi gayi hai, agar tum accha sulook karo aur parhezgari karo to,tum jo kar rahe ho us par Allah puri taraah qabardaar hai
